text: Maina Tudu is an Indian writer. She writes in the Santali language. She is a housewife from Odisha. She won the Yuva Puraskar in 2017. ==Biography== Tudu graduated in Santali. For her poetry Marsal Dahar she was awarded Yuva Puraskar in 2017. Tudu also wrote Ol Chiki Ada Gaban. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1980s births Category:Indian writers
title: Maina Tudu
